EventType.Description: The type of event you would like to subscribe and get notification for.

Name.Description: Unique name to identify an event subscription.

SnsTopicArn.Description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Simple Notification Service topic.

CrossAccountRoleArns.Description: Defines a list of role Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) to be used in other accounts. These ARNs are used for querying purposes while importing resources and assessing your application.

InvokerRoleName.Description: Existing AWS IAM role name in the primary AWS account that will be assumed by AWS Resilience Hub Service Principle to obtain a read-only access to your application resources while running an assessment.

Type.Description: Defines how AWS Resilience Hub scans your resources. It can scan for the resources by using a pre-existing role in your AWS account, or by using the credentials of the current IAM user.

AppArn.Description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the App.

AppTemplateBody.Description: A string containing full ResilienceHub app template body.

DriftStatus.Description: Indicates if compliance drifts (deviations) were detected while running an assessment for your application.

EventSubscriptions.Description: The list of events you would like to subscribe and get notification for.

ResiliencyPolicyArn.Description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Resiliency Policy.

DataLocationConstraint.Description: Data Location Constraint of the Policy.

PolicyArn.Description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Resiliency Policy.
